title: Heather Locklear chocolate
brief_description: Award-winning comedy about a gender-bending teenager (Einar Johansen) and his passion for nail polish. Each of his favorites has a story behind it, however his ‘holy grail’ of nail polishes is a colour worn by Heather Locklear in ‘Melrose Place’.
description: Award-winning comedy about a gender-bending teenager (Einar Johansen) and his passion for nail polish. Each of his favorites has a story behind it, however his ‘holy grail’ of nail polishes is a colour worn by Heather Locklear in ‘Melrose Place’.
